name: (Free Version) Makarya Notes - Advanced Note Taking App Design System + UI Kit
description:
Makarya Notes is a design system & UI kit for an advanced note-taking app, specially crafted using Figma. Each screen is arranged by various components, from atoms level until organism level components.


Besides that, you'll also get resizable screens for different screen resolutions, well-named layers inside each screen frame, and an interactive prototype.


Utilize every feature on Makarya Notes for your next project!
